nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Substracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@title Crowdsale
@dev Crowdsale is a base contract for managing a token crowdsale.
Crowdsales have a start and end timestamps, where investors can make
token purchases and the crowdsale will assign them tokens based
on a token per ETH rate. Funds collected are forwarded to a wallet
as they arrive. The contract requires a MintableToken that will be
minted as contributions arrive, note that the crowdsale contract
must be owner of the token in order to be able to mint it.
nodes.name: MCTokenCrowdsale
TokenPurchase
